summary: Utility module that supports the discovery, validation, and instantiation of diffusion pipelines and their components. It resolves custom pipeline definitions, maps model weights to appropriate devices, handles model variants and safetensors compatibility, and emits deprecation or usage warnings during the loading process.
business_intent: Enable seamless loading of pretrained diffusion models from repositories, including custom user-defined pipelines, while ensuring correct device placement and variant handling for production and research workflows.
